title: Demining and Increasing the Border Surveillance Capacity at the Eastern Borders of Turkey - Phase 3
description: Result 1: Up to 4.2 million mÂ² of territory cleared Result 2: Capacity building activities for Turkish Mine Action Centre (TURMAC) staff delivered Result 3: Mine Risk Education and Awareness Raising Activities delivered Result 4: Non-Technical Survey (NTS) conducted for on a minimum of 3502 minefields
